YouTube channel "ChessTalk". This channel is designed to provide training on various aspects of chess like openings, gambits, strategies, tactics, game plans, chess basics and rules, secret tips, tricks, traps, chess ideas, hacks, variations, middlegame/endgame plans, advanced moves, positional play, attacks etc.

YouTube channel "GothamChess". The author is an International Master from New York City. Different playlists of chess videos: openings, strategy, rating climb, tactics guides, and recaps of big tournaments.

YouTube channel "Chess.com". Video authors include World Champion Magnus Carlsen, U.S. Champion Hikaru Nakamura, Chief Chess Officer of Chess.com Daniel Rensch, chess commentator and GM Robert Hess, Women's World Chess Champion Alexandra Kosteniuk, and many more.
YouTube channel "Remote Chess Academy" contains video lessons from Grandmaster Igor Smirnov and several other GMs.
